actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to terminate the existence of certain Federal regulatory agencies after a specified period of time.

summary.text: Federal Regulatory Agency Termination Act - Terminates the existence of Federal regulatory agencies three years after they are created or three years after the enactment of this Act whichever is later, unless a different termination date has been set by the Act creating such agency or the Congress otherwise extends the life of such agency.

titles.title: A bill to terminate the existence of certain Federal regulatory agencies after a specified period of time.
